summary: Australian PR holder and full-stack engineer with 2+ years' experience building scalable web and desktop apps (Django, React, Electron). Skilled in delivering real-time features, CI/CD, and cross-platform solutions. Eager to contribute to innovative teams in the Australian tech industry.

description: Led backend development using Django, designing and maintaining robust APIs, authentication systems, and database schemas for various web applications.
Built and optimized CI/CD pipelines to automate testing, deployment, and environment provisioning, ensuring fast and reliable delivery across projects.
Occasionally contributed to front-end development (React, Next.js), depending on project scope, ensuring full-stack alignment and seamless integration.
Designed and implemented real-time features using WebSocket and async architecture for applications requiring instant updates, such as chat systems or live dashboards.
Worked closely with cross-functional teams to define system architecture, ensure scalability, and improve overall developer workflow.
Developed a cross-platform desktop chat application using Next.js and Electron, focusing on seamless performance, real-time communication, and intuitive user experience.
Implemented core features including multi-room messaging, real-time updates, and local data persistence.
Designed and built a complete CI/CD pipeline to automate build, test, and deployment processes for macOS and Windows platforms.
Integrated auto-update functionality using Electron's update system to ensure smooth delivery of new versions to end-users.
Handled code signing and certificate management for both Windows (using SignTool) and macOS (using Apple Developer ID), ensuring security and compliance with OS requirements.
Collaborated across teams to ensure development best practices, consistent versioning, and secure release management.
Contributed to the development of a WYSIWYG website builder tailored for client use, enabling non-technical users to create and customize web pages.
Focused on front-end development using React.js, building dynamic components and enhancing user interaction within the page editor.
Collaborated with senior developers to implement drag-and-drop features, real-time previews, and reusable UI components.
Gained experience in component-based architecture, responsive design, and modern front-end development workflows.
